summary.description:
a detailed microRNA database focused on ruminant species.

The ovine, bovine and caprine miRNA database.

The bovine, caprine and ovine miRNA database.

Bourdon,C., Bardou,P, Aujean,A. et al. RumimiR: a detailed microRNA database focused on ruminant species.

If you make use of the presented data, please cite our article.

“1” in second position means that the microRNA is not already listed in the RumimiR database (a microRNA occurring in different publications is more likely to be a true microRNA),.
